A Clever Bike chevron_right

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.

Jan. 1, 2018   tag

You read them all already?

I try to keep up with blogging, but I’ve traditionally gone long periods without posting anything. If you have any topics you think I should cover, let me know.

Haven’t learned enough?

The ability to impress you, go beyond your expectations, break a stereotype of any kind, beat the odds, achieve the “impossible”, or otherwise present you with the opposite result as what you expected is fun to me.
